description: Fix video debug page not accessible in production: route and nav button were gated behind a DEV-only flag that was missed during the page rewrite.

changes.description: Ungate video debug route and nav button for production super-admins
changes.details: App.tsx and ResearcherDashboard.tsx both had ENABLE_PLAYWRIGHT_DEBUG_PAGE (DEV-only) guards that prevented the route from registering and the nav button from rendering in production. Removed both; the page itself enforces the super-admin access check.
